items.title: Dependency security remediation (reachability-driven)
exitCriteria: All reachable vulnerabilities in the active dependency graph are either remediated or documented with risk acceptance approved in governance.
A repeatable remediation plan with owners, due dates, and closure evidence is recorded and linked from this queue item.

items.title: CI/OPS injection hardening
exitCriteria: Command invocation boundaries in CI/OPS scripts are hardened against untrusted input and validated by passing contract checks.
All high-risk shell/script entry points have explicit guardrails documented with reproducible verification commands.

items.title: Centralized path-boundary guard for IPC/file operations
exitCriteria: All IPC and file-operation path validations are routed through one centralized guard with deny-by-default behavior.
Path traversal and outside-root access attempts are covered by automated tests and fail closed.
